entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @SteveFDA You refuse to speak the truth about the Coronavirus. You interview on CNN today was a disgrace. 99% of Coronavirus cases are not "harmless" but you refuse to protect the America people and speak against the lies spewed by Trump. Shame on you! https://t.co/fhFIE2dTXe
